ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 1.13
ygData.msgSnippet: Reed, Great work! This fills in a lot of details from the last version. I ll be relying on this more than ever. And thanks to everyone who helped compile the
ygData.messageBody:
Reed,

Great work! This fills in a lot of details from the last version. I'll be
relying on this more than ever.

And thanks to everyone who helped compile the information for Reed. This
is the Bard's Song Bible.

Tzeetch

--- Reed Stormwind <eqreed@...> wrote:

For those who use it, my latest bard song calculator spreadsheet is
available.  (It's an Excell spreadsheet that calculates numbers given

level and instruments).  It should be up at Rokenn's site
shortly(www.eqsongs.com) but until then, you can get it here:

http://www.geocities.com/eqreed/BardSongSpreadsheet.html

The main changes are some more sets of numbers have been added, and lots
of song to song incompatibilities have been added.  See the
Documentation sheet for details.

If you have any comments or modifications (or questions ;), please e-mail
me at eqreed@....  Enjoy!

Reed Stormwind (54 bard of E'ci)
